content.7: And he called the name of the place Massah, and Meribah, because of the chiding of the children of Israel, and because they tempted the
content.8: Then came Amalek, and fought with Israel in Rephidim.
content.9: And Moses said unto Joshua, Choose us out men, and go out, fight with Amalek: to morrow I will stand on the top of the hill with the rod of God in mine hand.
content.10: So Joshua did as Moses had said to him, and fought with Amalek: and Moses, Aaron, and Hur went up to the top of the hill.
content.11: And it came to pass, when Moses held up his hand, that Israel prevailed: and when he let down his hand, Amalek prevailed.
content.13: And Joshua discomfited Amalek and his people with the edge of the sword.
